0.description: The transaction of this method has started, but no transactions have been processed yet.

1.description: The transaction of this method has been authorized but not yet captured. The credit limit has been reserved on the credit card.

2.description: The transaction of this payment method has been captured, and funds are secured.

3.description: The transaction of this payment method has been refunded.

4.description: The transaction of this payment method has been denied either by the issuing bank, acquirer, or anti-fraud tool.

5.description: The transaction of this payment method has been canceled after being previously authorized.

6.description: The transaction of this payment method has been abandoned. It remained with  the Started status for too long, without changing to another status in the meantime.

7.description: The transaction of this payment method has been reported as chargeback.

8.description: The funds of the transaction of this payment method have been transferred to the store.

9.description: The transaction of this payment method has been partially refunded.

A.description: There was an error while processing the transaction of this payment method. This status is followed by a message with more details about the error.

B.description: The system explicitly marked this transaction as a major issue that should be investigated. This is a rare status. You don't need to worry about it while integrating with Tuna.

C.description: For some reason, the transaction of this payment method could not be captured. The system will automatically retry to capture it later.

D.description: For some reason, the transaction of this payment method could not be canceled. The system will automatically retry to cancel it later.

P.description: The system is waiting for the result of another process, such as anti-fraud analysis, to complete the transaction. Whether the transaction has already been authorized or not depends on how your flows are configured.

N.description: This payment method will not be processed. This status is final.
